1.1: You must be the change you wish to see in the world. -Mahatma Gandhi
2.1: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier. -Mother Teresa
3.1: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself. -Franklin D. Roosevelt
4.1: Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that. -Martin Luther King Jr
5.1: Do one thing every day that scares you. -Eleanor Roosevelt
6.1: Well done is better than well said. -Benjamin Franklin
7.1: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart. -Helen Keller
8.1: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light. -Aristotle
9.1: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail. -Ralph Waldo Emerson
10.1: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken. -Oscar Wilde
11.1: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated. -Maya Angelou
12.1: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams! Live the life you`ve imagined. -Henry David Thoreau
13.1: In the end, it`s not the years in your life that count. It`s the life in your years. -Abraham Lincoln
14.1: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game. -Babe Ruth
15.1: In this life we cannot do great things. We can only do small things with great love. -Mother Teresa
16.1: Many of life`s failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up. -Thomas A. Edison
17.1: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose. -Dr. Seuss
18.1: If life were predictable it would cease to be life and be without flavor. -Eleanor Roosevelt
19.1: In the end, it`s not the years in your life that count. It`s the life in your years. -Abraham Lincoln
20.1: Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood. -Ralph Waldo Emerson
21.1: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated. -Maya Angelou
22.1: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game. -Babe Ruth
23.1: Life is never fair, and perhaps it is a good thing for most of us that it is not. -Oscar Wilde
24.1: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin. -Tony Robbins
25.1: In this life we cannot do great things. We can only do small things with great love. -Mother Teresa
26.1: Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile. -Albert Einstein
27.1: The purpose of our lives is to be happy. -Dalai Lama
28.1: You may say I`m a dreamer, but I`m not the only one. I hope someday you`ll join us. And the world will live as one. -John Lennon
29.1: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough. -Mae West
30.1: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment. -Ralph Waldo Emerson
31.1: Don`t worry when you are not recognized, but strive to be worthy of recognition. -Abraham Lincoln
